from unittest.mock import patch
import pytest
import geopy.exc
import geopy.geocoders
from geopy.geocoders import What3Words
from geopy.geocoders import What3WordsV3
from geopy.geocoders.what3words import _check_query

class TestUnitWhat3Words():
    def test_check_query(self):
        result_check_threeword_query = _check_query('fahrpreis.lügner.kutsche')
        assert result_check_threeword_query
    
TestUnitWhat3Words().test_check_query()
